body:
@hupuxiaojun 
Do you have a good idea? Do in the startup phase control is reasonable, you can provide a ` PR ` up to discuss.
Mandatory stop of services that have been started will have several problems:
1. Which one to stop?
2. If a request is being processed, it needs to be stopped after the request is completed
Please refer to this blog: http://dubbo.apache.org/zh-cn/blog/introduction-to-dubbo-qos.html
#2097 has fixed this problem.
this test case has been ignored.
Feel free to reopen if necessary.
We have change the default retries to 2, it will be release in 2.6.4.
Feel free to reopen if necessary.

Maybe you need to process the concurrent problem in your service provider.

Feel free to reopen if necessary.

@wujun8 You could use Activate 's order property.

Feel free to reopen if necessary.
I think it's a useful pr. I'll close it
Now the 2.6.x and 2.7.x have so many conflicts, so we cannot merge 2.6.x to 2.7.x totally
@bohrqiu Please check the review comments. It's recommend that add some unit test cases for this problem.
@greatqn pls file a new PR. I think this pr needs to be closed firstly.
I've checked the ci result, it's failed because of the unstable case. I've merge master to this branch.
@kimmking can you tell me how to solve?

@diecui1202 
If I'm not presenting clearly, let's put it this way.
I define one filter f1 with `@Activate(order=10000)`, so it is supposed to exec last.
But then another colleague define another filter f2 without annotation, he define the order by `<dubbo:service filter="f1,f2"/>` in xml. The goal is reorder the filters, but it won't work. 
So, I think the config should be override by use defined filter property in xml, ignore the before defined order.
Also, looks like I don't have the permission to reopen the issue.

一台机器启动多个dubbo服务，没有为每个服务指定不同的cache文件
<dubbo:registry file="dubboregistry/xxx.properties"/> ,所有服务都默认共用了一个cache导致
@LeoAugust19 Could you solve the conflict?
OK, annotation only applies to certain filter that exec before filters on a specify service, or don't use annotation.

Currently dubbo has no way to support this feature, We have noticed this demand and have plans to solve it.
There is a solution that is not elegant：
1. Calling cached services that need to be grouped by generalization
@kimmking please check this PR again.
This exception message is not correct, we have fixed it in #566. Pls check the newest version.
Looks good to me.

Get loadbalance instance is not waste time. Maybe AvailableCluster、AvailableClusterInvoker、BroadcastClusterInvoker will use it later.

Combine the loadbalance init logic together is a good idea.
@diecui1202 I have added some unit tests for this PR just now, please review it.
@diecui1202 Yes! This patch can solve the conflict problem.
@zonghaishang Thank you for your answer, Take the liberty to ask. Will dubbo version 2.7.0 solve this problem?
@mizhoux great job.
@elvis9xu163 I'll close this PR, we can take more discussion on #2273
@mizhoux Please check the review comment. Thanks.
@wanwanpp please check the comments and review suggestions.

@diecui1202 
Ok, another pr will be sent soon.
Looks good to me.
@diecui1202 I have changed the description of the failure message. Please review again. I think it was the word "here" made you confused, so I changed it to "by the above code".

在2.6.2版本是这样设置的
配置文件：`dubbo.application.qos-enable = false`  或者  `dubbo.application.qosEnable = false`，如果是Spring Boot环境，以上两种都支持，如果是非Spring Boot环境，则只支持第二种
设置JVM启动参数：`-Ddubbo.application.qosEnable = false`
@zhongzunfa uncertainty
@carryxyh  I have add some comment while I review your code. Please check it.
@lexburner Thanks for your contributing. I think this PR is a big feature, so I suggest discussing it on the dev mail list. BTW, pls. solve the conflicts.
@bobchengit you can use jstack to check the main thread stack.
OK, I took a misunderstanding on it. Now It looks good to me.
it's rare race case on different process level, no need to fix.
this issue is not necessary to fix, therefore this PR is not valid any longer.
this issue has been closed as 'will-not-fix', therefore close the corresponding pull request.

The LogTelnetHandler does not work under slf4j, such as change log level and get log file content. Change log level is useful, but get log file content, I think it's useless.

The two methods getLevel and getFile are used for telnet handler, but I found it's not correct. 

Therefore in this PR, the two methods are just empty implementation, I've started a new issue #2312 to track this.

What's the mean of "RMI prtoclol" ?
Now the default prtoclol is Dubbo protocol 
I will close it. Feel free to reopen it when you have any queations.

The solution to the problem of multiple network cards is here: https://github.com/dubbo/dubbo-samples/tree/master/dubbo-samples-docker

You can aslo configure them in the server hosts file

Now the hessian protocol cannot support that：one server interface  multiple methods with the same name (overload)

I will close it now, if you have any question, free feel to reopen it
Feel free to reopen if necessary.
Feel free to reopen.

similar to #2174

2.0.1 and 2.0.2(will be present in 2.6.3 and 2.7.x) is the dubbo protocol version, it's useless for users, just for dubbo developers for compatibility.

This problem is only exists in 2.5.9 and 2.5.10. I suggest you upgrade to 2.6.2 or 2.6.3(coming soon).

@ls9527 Why do you need to process biz exception in your project ?

我是想说，我想扩展 ExceptionFilter 默认的处理。

以这个场景为例子。  我必须复制`ExceptionFilter` 整个类。  

我可能需要 com.mycompany 包下的都抛出去，
也可能A包的Exception与B包的Interface 的情况下，抛出去。
也可能指定的com.a.b.MyExcpetion的无论怎么样都抛出去

就以目前的业务而言，我就希望对于指定某几个类一定要抛出去，不管调用者是不是找得到。
我列举的这些场景，如果扩展 ExceptionFilter 的默认处理方式自然是最好的。
但是我不得不抄一遍ExceptionFilter的实现

加入自定义处理器根本处理不了这些异常。
必须删除默认的，然后自己扩展 ExceptionFilter 的默认情况

@diecui1202 
Do we make RpcException instead of RuntimeException?
@xiaobzhou I think we miss an annotation for method config.
